content.raw:
Hi Dan,

Thank you very much for your reply! 

It makes sense that the time between triggers needs to be at least 34ms. I'm not quite sure what is going on - I tried changing the time between images to 1 second and see the same behavior. I will try to look into this more. For the single image runs, the experimental cycle time was set to 2s, which is longer than the camera readout time. If I figure out what is going on, I will post again.
content.html:
Hi Dan,

Thank you very much for your reply!

It makes sense that the time between triggers needs to be at least 34ms. I'm not quite sure what is going on - I tried changing the time between images to 1 second and see the same behavior. I will try to look into this more. For the single image runs, the experimental cycle time was set to 2s, which is longer than the camera readout time. If I figure out what is going on, I will post again.
